entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as crying and having a sharp pain in his throat when seeing Dumbledore's body. He tries to make a friendly gesture to Hagrid but fails due to Hagrid's swollen eyes.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's body is wrapped in purple velvet spangled with golden stars and placed on the table by Hagrid. Harry knows it to be Dumbledore's body.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as looking white and shocked when seeing Dumbledore's body.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is crying and has tears falling into her lap when seeing Dumbledore's body.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is crying and has tears falling into her lap when seeing Dumbledore's body.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid places Dumbledore's body on the table and retreats down the aisle, blowing his nose with loud noises. His eyes are swollen due to crying.

entities.name: dolores umbridge
entities.description: Dolores Umbridge is scandalized by Hagrid's loud noises while blowing his nose and looks at him disapprovingly.

relationships.description: Harry knows Dumbledore's body to be placed on the table.
Ron is shocked when seeing Dumbledore's body.
Ginny is crying when seeing Dumbledore's body.
Hermione is crying when seeing Dumbledore's body.
Hagrid places Dumbledore's body on the table.
Dolores Umbridge is scandalized by Hagrid's loud noises while blowing his nose.
